title: Tasty pasta salad
ingredients: ['For the pasta salad', '250g to 500g pasta of your choice', '3 tomatoes, chopped', '2 medium cucumbers, chopped', '4 to 6 slices salami, chopped', '1 to 2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 pinch dried mint', '1 pinch dried basil', '70g to 140g olives, sliced', '100g pickle of your choice', 'For the dressing', '60ml to 80ml lemon juice', '100ml to 120ml olive oil', 'salt, to taste', 'TabascoÂ®, to taste']
